local isImmortal = false
local infiniteHealthValue = math.huge
local heartbeatConnection = nil

local function becomeTrulyImmortal(character)
    local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
    if not humanoid then
        humanoid = character:WaitForChild("Humanoid", 10)
        if not humanoid then return end
    end

    humanoid:SetStateEnabled(Enum.HumanoidStateType.Dead, false)
    humanoid.BreakJointsOnDeath = false
    humanoid.Died:Connect(function()
        if isImmortal then
            humanoid.Health = infiniteHealthValue
            humanoid.Sit = false
            humanoid.PlatformStand = false
        end
    end)
end

local function toggleImmortality()
    isImmortal = not isImmortal
    local character = localPlayer.Character
    if not character then return end
    
    local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
    if not humanoid then return end

    if isImmortal then
        -- ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏∞
        humanoid.MaxHealth = infiniteHealthValue
        humanoid.Health = infiniteHealthValue
        ToggleButton.Text = "ON"
        ToggleButton.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(60, 150, 60)
        StarterGui:SetCoreGuiEnabled(Enum.CoreGuiType.ResetButton, false)
        
        heartbeatConnection = RunService.Heartbeat:Connect(function()
            if isImmortal and humanoid.Health < infiniteHealthValue then
                humanoid.Health = infiniteHealthValue
            end
        end)
    else
        -- ‡∏õ‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏∞
        humanoid.MaxHealth = 100
        humanoid.Health = 100
        ToggleButton.Text = "OFF"
        ToggleButton.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(80, 80, 80)
        StarterGui:SetCoreGuiEnabled(Enum.CoreGuiType.ResetButton, true)
        if heartbeatConnection then
            heartbeatConnection:Disconnect()
            heartbeatConnection = nil
        end
    end
end

ToggleButton.MouseButton1Click:Connect(toggleImmortality)

localPlayer.CharacterAdded:Connect(function(character)
    becomeTrulyImmortal(character)
    if isImmortal then
        local humanoid = character:WaitForChild("Humanoid", 10)
        if humanoid then
            humanoid.MaxHealth = infiniteHealthValue
            humanoid.Health = infiniteHealthValue
        end
    end
end)

if localPlayer.Character then
    becomeTrulyImmortal(localPlayer.Character)
end
